title: Wayland's Fix For Multi Windows Apps Is A Disaster
description:
Fairly recently I talked about a new Wayland protocol to support multi window workflows like X11 offers and I had hoped that discussion would go well, it didn't so now there's a whole new discussion about a whole new protocol
